text:
Hi All,

Need to Consume deals API.  Does anyone having any Specific document. Specially creating test account with auth credentials

When I've done custom form shenanigans for clients, I've often relied on the "hs_context" hidden field that had a key "formValidity" to make sure all the fields were valid before doing whatever/submitting. But it seems that's disappeared now? :thinking_face: Does anyone else have any ideas on how to check if a form is valid? (In this case it's a multi-step form, so I have a custom button that checks validity before going to the next slide/submitting).
Hi Community. Does anyone using HubSpot All-in-one Plugin on Wordpress and found the pop up form doesn't shows up on the wordpress page?
The integration should be all good, and the pop-up form display targeting setting is correct, and I didn't found any add-on that will conflicting the form :wave-yeti:

I was just sent a message prompting to upgrade to have access to Marketing contacts. I am very concerned with our contact list, I export/import users that have bounced, or unsubscribed from our newsletter. But it doesn't seem like they are dropping off our contact list. Any help would be greatly appreciated, as we just want to ensure that we aren't being charged for contacts we don't need/use.

The representative also said: Additional resources: please refer to the following articles to further understand Marketing Contacts.
• <https://c1frs04.na1.HubSpotlinks.com/Ctc/IZ+113/c1FRs04/VVJkpl4VLJNnW4fYF9d6v-tj4V9TLwZ4WChvKN9cd5H13clGrV1-WJV7CgZr_W5lbqXL8Nq_DGW7m6LvM1v4TqLN2B74_vM9LzTW1JgH8R7Gx24CW4JVCv_1T7KY6W4zKBTC6Xyzf7W1lfF0b7LYVFYW84kz3X2rpRWdW3WT2756mrJJcW8763rx7jpkLGW3CgRq35KNLmJW6zPh6C3tkJLqW8Mqcs31CfQCNW74ML8g90SSNPVPs2177DkJw-W8ZnS9s4R09ThW3VxwLR2L2W94W4Y6xVP3lZ8lnW8kwHmC5Hzf0kVCL0CB3XkCwwW5hlPN147LzLfW6MjmNr75b2tH33CK1|Understand marketing contacts>
